articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Getting Started
articles.contents:
To begin your coding journey, I recommend watching and following
along with the below tutorials. In these tutorials you will:
Learn how to install R and RStudio
Become familiar with the basic setup and structure of RStudio (where
we will spend essentially all of our time coding)
Learn about working directories and R
Projects
Create your first .R and .Rmd scripts and see the differences
between the two types of scripts. In our lessons, we will use .Rmd
files, but I think it’s important to learn about both
Get a brief introduction to the world of tidyverse
Learn about my typical workflow in R, where I also mention a few
tips and tricks along the way
Introduction to R


Introduction to Tidyverse


My Workflow

articles.title: R for Beginners
articles.contents:
R for Beginners
          
          
          Getting Started
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              R for Beginners
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Contact Us
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            
            Welcome
            Are you interested in learning how to code in R, but have
            no idea where to start? If this is you… you’ve come to the
            right place!
            The goal of this website is to make learning R fun and
            easy! Although many people find the idea of learning how to
            code to be daunting and overwhelming, it doesn’t need to be.
            With the right resources and tools, coding can be enjoyable
            and incredibly rewarding!
            On this website, you will find hours of tutorials to help
            you begin your R coding journey. We will cover everything
            from introducing you to RStudio, to writing your first R
            Markdown script, to learning about dataframes and different
            types of variables.
            ✓ Getting Started:
            We highly recommend you start your journey by going through
            the tutorials in the Getting Started section, especially if
            you are new to programming. ✓ Workshops: The
            workshops are designed for beginners and we make sure to
            cover all of the basics and fundamentals. ✓ Websites: Do you
            want to apply your new R skills and build your own website?
            Check out the tutorials to help you build a website using
            the distill or blogdown
            package.
            
            License and Citation: You can use,
            share, modify, and adapt any of the tutorials or lessons,
            but please include the following attribution:
            R4Beginners. (May 30, 2022). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.6595406
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              R for Beginners
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      GitHub
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      Contact Us
